short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Paparazzi extension brings you the latest news and exclusive content for all your favourite celebrities on your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss any latest news about anything that is going on in Hollywood, and much more on your new and personalized homepage.
Make every new tab an interactive visual experience to make your browser your own personal space. Join our community and make your browser truly AMAZING!

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Paparazzi Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use - https://www.thepaparazzi.live/terms-of-use-2/
and Privacy Policy - https://www.thepaparazzi.live/privacy-policy-2/

About Us - https://thepaparazzi.live/about-us/
